00042 CLexiconReadWindow::CLexiconReadWindow(ListCSwordModuleInfo moduleList, CMDIArea* parent, const char *name) : CReadWindow(moduleList, parent,name) {
00043     setKey( CSwordKey::createInstance(moduleList.first()) );
00044 //  key()->key("");
00045 }

00048 }

00057 
00059 void CLexiconReadWindow::insertKeyboardActions( KAccel* a ){
00060     a->insert("Next entry",     i18n("Next entry"),     "", IDK_PRESENTER_NEXT_ENTRY, 0, "", true, true);
00061     a->insert("Previous entry", i18n("Previous entry"), "", IDK_PRESENTER_NEXT_ENTRY, 0, "", true, true);   
00062 }
00063 
00064 void CLexiconReadWindow::initKeyboardActions() {
00065   CReadWindow::initKeyboardActions();
00066 
00067 
00068   CBTConfig::setupAccel(CBTConfig::lexiconWindow, accel());
00069   insertKeyboardActions(accel());
00070   accel()->readSettings();
00071 
00072   accel()->setSlot("Next entry", this, SLOT(nextEntry()));
00073   accel()->setSlot("Previous entry",  this, SLOT(previousEntry()));
00074 };
00075 
00077 void CLexiconReadWindow::initConnections(){
00078     connect(keyChooser(), SIGNAL(keyChanged(CSwordKey*)),
00079         this, SLOT(lookup(CSwordKey*)));
00080 }
00081 
00082 void CLexiconReadWindow::initView(){
00083     qWarning("CLexiconReadWindow::initView()");
00084     setMainToolBar( new KToolBar(this) );
00085     Q_ASSERT( mainToolBar() );
00086     addDockWindow(mainToolBar());
00087 
00088     setKeyChooser( CKeyChooser::createInstance(modules(), key(), mainToolBar()) );
00089     mainToolBar()->insertWidget(0,keyChooser()->sizeHint().width(),keyChooser());   
00090     mainToolBar()->setItemAutoSized(0);
00091 
00092     setModuleChooserBar( new CModuleChooserBar(modules(), modules().first()->type(), this) );
00093     addDockWindow( moduleChooserBar() );
00094     setDisplayWidget( CDisplay::createReadInstance(this) );     
00095     setCentralWidget( displayWidget()->view() );
00096 
00097     setIcon(CToolClass::getIconForModule(modules().first()));
00098 }
00099 
00100 void CLexiconReadWindow::setupPopupMenu(){
00101     popup()->insertTitle(CToolClass::getIconForModule(modules().first()), i18n("Lexicon window"));
00102 
00103     m_actions.selectAll = new KAction(i18n("Select all"), KShortcut(0), displayWidget()->connectionsProxy(), SLOT(selectAll()), actionCollection());
00104   m_actions.selectAll->plug(popup());
00105 
00106   (new KActionSeparator())->plug( popup() );
00107 
00108     m_actions.copyMenu = new KActionMenu(i18n("Copy..."), ICON_EDIT_COPY);  
00109     
00110   m_actions.copy.reference = new KAction(i18n("Reference"), KShortcut(0), displayWidget()->connectionsProxy(), SLOT(copyAnchorOnly()), actionCollection());
00111     m_actions.copyMenu->insert(m_actions.copy.reference);
00112 
00113   m_actions.copy.entry = new KAction(i18n("Entry with text"), KShortcut(0), displayWidget()->connectionsProxy(), SLOT(copyAll()), actionCollection());
00114     m_actions.copyMenu->insert(m_actions.copy.entry);
00115   m_actions.copyMenu->insert(new KActionSeparator());   
00116     m_actions.copy.selectedText = new KAction(i18n("Selected text"), KShortcut(0), displayWidget()->connectionsProxy(), SLOT(copySelection()),actionCollection());
00117     m_actions.copyMenu->insert(m_actions.copy.selectedText);
00118     m_actions.copyMenu->plug(popup());
00119 
00120     m_actions.saveMenu = new KActionMenu(i18n("Save..."),ICON_FILE_SAVE);   
00121     m_actions.save.entryAsPlain = new KAction(i18n("Entry as plain text"), KShortcut(0), displayWidget()->connectionsProxy(), SLOT(saveAsPlain()),actionCollection());
00122     m_actions.saveMenu->insert(m_actions.save.entryAsPlain);
00123     m_actions.save.entryAsHTML = new KAction(i18n("Entry as HTML"), KShortcut(0), displayWidget()->connectionsProxy(), SLOT(saveAsHTML()),actionCollection());
00124     m_actions.saveMenu->insert(m_actions.save.entryAsHTML);
00125     m_actions.saveMenu->plug(popup());
00126 
00127     m_actions.printMenu = new KActionMenu(i18n("Print..."),ICON_FILE_PRINT);    
00128     m_actions.print.reference = new KAction(i18n("Reference"), KShortcut(0), displayWidget()->connectionsProxy(), SLOT(printAnchorWithText()), actionCollection());
00129     m_actions.printMenu->insert(m_actions.print.reference);         
00130   m_actions.print.entry = new KAction(i18n("Entry with text"), KShortcut(0), displayWidget()->connectionsProxy(), SLOT(printAll()), actionCollection());
00131     m_actions.printMenu->insert(m_actions.print.entry);     
00132     m_actions.printMenu->plug(popup());
00133 }
00134 
00136 void CLexiconReadWindow::updatePopupMenu(){
00137     m_actions.copy.reference->setEnabled( displayWidget()->hasActiveAnchor() );
00138     m_actions.copy.selectedText->setEnabled( displayWidget()->hasSelection() );
00139 
00140     m_actions.print.reference->setEnabled( displayWidget()->hasActiveAnchor() );
00141 }
00142 
00144 void CLexiconReadWindow::nextEntry(){
00145   keyChooser()->setKey(ldKey()->NextEntry());
00146 }
00147 
00149 void CLexiconReadWindow::previousEntry(){
00150   keyChooser()->setKey(ldKey()->PreviousEntry());
00151 }
00152 
00154 CSwordLDKey* CLexiconReadWindow::ldKey(){
00155   qWarning("CLexiconReadWindow::key()");
00156     CSwordLDKey* k = dynamic_cast<CSwordLDKey*>(CDisplayWindow::key());
00157     Q_ASSERT(k);
00158     return k;
00159 }
